templates_data.report_name: All Veeam four-eyes authorization events for the last 24h
templates_data.report_description: Provides an overview of Veeam Backup & Replication four-eyes authorization events created for the last 24 hours.

data.name: All four-eyes authorization events for the last 24h
data.description: Provides an overview of Veeam Backup & Replication four-eyes authorization events created for the last 24 hours.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("42402")
| alter _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($vbr_hosts)
| comp count(_instanceId) as _count




| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = _count

data.title: Four-Eyes Authorization Events by Type
data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ( "42402")
| alter _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0),
        _operation=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "Operation\=\"([^\"]*)(?:\"|$)"),0)
| comp count(_instanceId ) as _count by _operation
| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = _operation yaxis = _count

data.title: Latest Four-Eyes Authorization Events
data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ( "42402")
| alter
    _time= parse_timestamp("%FT%H:%M:%E6S%Ez", arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "<\d+>1\s+(\S+)\s"), 0)),
    _host=regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"),
    _description=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "Description\=\"([^\"]*)(?:\"|$)"),0),
    _severity="Critical",
    _user=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "fullName\=\"([^\"]*)\""), 0)
| sort desc _time
| fields
    _host as `Data Source`, _time as `Date`, _user as `User`, _description as `Message Details`, _severity as `Severity`

widgets_data.title: Four-Eyes Authorization Events
widgets_data.description: The total amount of Veeam Backup & Replication four-eyes authorization events.

data.phrase:
dataset in (veeam_*) 
| filter _vendor="Veeam"
| alter 
    _instanceId=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log, "instanceId\=(\d+)\s"), 0)
| filter _instanceId in ("42402")
| alter _host=arrayindex(regextract(_raw_log , "\s(\S+)\s(?:Veeam_MP|Veeam_Backup)"), 0)
| filter _host in ($vbr_hosts)
| comp count(_instanceId) as _count





| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = _count
